article_title: Employer Mandate, Not Obamacare Tax Credit, Real Issue Before Supreme Court

article_metadata.author: Janet Novack

og.description: Another drafting quirk: if tax credits are not available to a state's residents, employers in that state are exempt from the health insurance mandate.
og.title: Employer Mandate, Not Obamacare Tax Credit, Real Issue Before Supreme Court
